movies.title: Saw
movies.description: A man wakes up in a room with no memory of how he got there and must play a deadly game to survive.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.description: A family is haunted by disturbing events, prompting paranormal investigators to uncover the truth.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief enters the dreams of others to steal secrets, but he faces his toughest job yet.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker discovers that reality is not what it seems and that he is part of a larger rebellion.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A young couple from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

movies.title: The Notebook
movies.description: A couple reflects on their decades-long romance, as their love story unfolds through memories and trials.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers must unite to undo the damage caused by Thanos and restore the balance of the universe.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a tyrannical warlord in a high-speed chase.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: A young lion prince must reclaim his rightful place as king after his father's untimely death.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: Toys come to life when their owner isn't around, and Woody, a cowboy doll, must accept a new toy in the family.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: A powerful mafia family struggles with betrayal, loyalty, and the future of their empire as the new generation rises.

movies.title: Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two men form a life-long bond after being sentenced to prison for crimes they did not commit, and plan their escape.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A theme park with genetically engineered dinosaurs goes awry when the creatures break free and wreak havoc.

movies.title: Indiana Jones: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.description: An archaeologist races against Nazis to find the biblical Ark of the Covenant and prevent its power from falling into evil hands.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.description: A struggling salesman takes care of his young son while facing numerous challenges in the pursuit of a better life.

movies.title: A Beautiful Mind
movies.description: A brilliant but troubled mathematician struggles with schizophrenia while achieving groundbreaking work in game theory.

movies.title: The Exorcist
movies.description: A young girl is possessed by a demon, and a team of priests is called upon to perform a dangerous exorcism.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces his greatest adversary, the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on plunging Gotham into chaos.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Spider-Man's secret identity is revealed, and he teams up with other versions of Spider-Man from alternate universes.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.description: A princess with magical ice powers embarks on a dangerous journey to find her estranged sister and save their kingdom.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.description: A group of kids uncover a government conspiracy and face supernatural threats in their small town.

series.title: Breaking Bad
series.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer struggles with moral dilemmas and criminal pressure.

series.title: Game of Thrones
series.description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne in a brutal, politically charged medieval fantasy world.

series.title: The Crown
series.description: A biographical drama chronicling the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the modern British monarchy.

series.title: The Office
series.description: A mockumentary-style comedy that takes a look at the everyday lives of office employees at Dunder Mifflin.

series.title: Friends
series.description: Six friends navigate life's ups and downs in New York City, dealing with work, relationships, and personal growth.

series.title: The Mandalorian
series.description: A lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy embarks on a mission to protect a mysterious child from dark forces.

series.title: Black Mirror
series.description: An anthology series exploring the dark side of modern society and the unintended consequences of new technologies.

series.title: The Witcher
series.description: A monster hunter with a complex destiny struggles to find his place in a world full of magical creatures and political intrigue.

series.title: Narcos
series.description: The rise of the Medell√≠n drug cartel and the battle to bring down its infamous leader, Pablo Escobar.

series.title: Sherlock
series.description: A modern-day adaptation of the famous detective Sherlock Holmes as he solves cases with his friend, Dr. Watson.

series.title: Money Heist
series.description: A mastermind plans and executes a heist on the Royal Mint of Spain, assembling a team of criminals to carry it out.

series.title: Stranger Things
series.description: A group of kids uncover a government conspiracy and face supernatural threats in their small town.

series.title: Westworld
series.description: In a futuristic theme park, artificial beings begin to question their reality, leading to an escalating struggle for control.

series.title: Peaky Blinders
series.description: A gangster family in post-WWI Birmingham rises to power, facing internal and external struggles in a dangerous world.

series.title: The Boys
series.description: A group of vigilantes take on corrupt superheroes, exposing the dark side of heroism in a world where they are controlled by corporations.

series.title: Lucifer
series.description: The Devil abandons Hell to live in Los Angeles, where he opens a nightclub and helps the LAPD solve crimes.

series.title: Fargo
series.description: A series inspired by the Coen Brothers' movie, revolving around crime, deception, and morally complex characters in a bleak Midwestern setting.

series.title: The Walking Dead
series.description: Survivors of a zombie apocalypse struggle to stay alive, build new communities, and face the challenges of living in a hostile world.

series.title: How I Met Your Mother
series.description: A man recounts to his children the story of how he met their mother, through the ups and downs of his dating life and friendships.
